branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1B10, Mechanically Jointed, 10mm Bore - Basic Type
branchCategory.description: <p>The MY1B10 Rodless Cylinders have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure combined with an outer dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile. Rubber bumpers are standard and external shock absorbers are optional.</p>
